mapper.select: select id, name, gender_code, age, birthday, nation_code, nationality_cation, native_place, education_code, occupation_code, marry_code, cert_code, cert_no, phone, email, often_code, now_prov, now_city, now_area, now_address, now_post_code, native_prov, native_city, native_area, native_address, native_post_code, contact_name, contact_rela_code, contact_phone, contact_post_code, contact_address, take_name, take_rela_code, take_cert_no, take_phone, work, work_phone, work_post_code, work_address, blood_code, family_disease, expose_disease, heredity_disease, allergy_disease, past_disease, past_oper, past_trauma, past_blood, past_remark, allergy_remark, pym, wbm, remark, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time from center_profile_file where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into center_profile_file(id, name, gender_code, age, age_unit_code,birthday, nation_code, nationality_cation, native_place, education_code, occupation_code,marry_code, cert_code, cert_no, phone, email, often_code, now_prov, now_city, now_area, now_address, now_post_code, native_prov, native_city, native_area, native_address, native_post_code, contact_name, contact_rela_code, contact_phone, contact_post_code, contact_address, take_name, take_rela_code, take_cert_no, take_phone, work, work_phone, work_post_code, work_address, blood_code, family_disease, expose_disease, heredity_disease, allergy_disease, past_disease, past_oper, past_trauma, past_blood, past_remark, allergy_remark, pym, wbm, remark, crte_id, crte_name) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{genderCode}, #{age},#{ageUnitCode}, #{birthday}, #{nationCode}, #{nationalityCation}, #{nativePlace}, #{educationCode}, #{occupationCode}, #{marryCode}, #{certCode}, #{certNo}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{oftenCode}, #{nowProv}, #{nowCity}, #{nowArea}, #{nowAddress}, #{nowPostCode}, #{nativeProv}, #{nativeCity}, #{nativeArea}, #{nativeAddress}, #{nativePostCode}, #{contactName}, #{contactRelaCode}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactPostCode}, #{contactAddress}, #{takeName}, #{takeRelaCode}, #{takeCertNo}, #{takePhone}, #{work}, #{workPhone}, #{workPostCode}, #{workAddress}, #{bloodCode}, #{familyDisease}, #{exposeDisease}, #{heredityDisease}, #{allergyDisease}, #{pastDisease}, #{pastOper}, #{pastTrauma}, #{pastBlood}, #{pastRemark}, #{allergyRemark}, #{pym}, #{wbm}, #{remark}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}) on duplicate key update remark=#{remark};
mapper.update:
update center_profile_file
name = #{name},
gender_code = #{genderCode},
age = #{age},
age_unit_code = #{ageUnitCode},
birthday = #{birthday},
nation_code = #{nationCode},
nationality_cation = #{nationalityCation},
native_place = #{nativePlace},
education_code = #{educationCode},
occupation_code = #{occupationCode},
marry_code = #{marryCode},
cert_code = #{certCode},
cert_no = #{certNo},
phone = #{phone},
email = #{email},
often_code = #{oftenCode},
now_prov = #{nowProv},
now_city = #{nowCity},
now_area = #{nowArea},
now_address = #{nowAddress},
now_post_code = #{nowPostCode},
native_prov = #{nativeProv},
native_city = #{nativeCity},
native_area = #{nativeArea},
native_address = #{nativeAddress},
native_post_code = #{nativePostCode},
contact_name = #{contactName},
contact_rela_code = #{contactRelaCode},
contact_phone = #{contactPhone},
contact_post_code = #{contactPostCode},
contact_address = #{contactAddress},
take_name = #{takeName},
take_rela_code = #{takeRelaCode},
take_cert_no = #{takeCertNo},
take_phone = #{takePhone},
work = #{work},
work_phone = #{workPhone},
work_post_code = #{workPostCode},
work_address = #{workAddress},
blood_code = #{bloodCode},
family_disease = #{familyDisease},
expose_disease = #{exposeDisease},
heredity_disease = #{heredityDisease},
allergy_disease = #{allergyDisease},
past_disease = #{pastDisease},
past_oper = #{pastOper},
past_trauma = #{pastTrauma},
past_blood = #{pastBlood},
past_remark = #{pastRemark},
allergy_remark = #{allergyRemark},
pym = #{pym},
wbm = #{wbm},
remark = #{remark},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, profile_id, in_profile, out_profile, total_out, total_in, outpt_last_visit_time, inpt_last_visit_time, source_tj_code, source_tj_remark, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time from center_profile_file_extend where profile_id = #{profileId} and hosp_code = #{hospCode}
mapper.insert: insert into center_profile_file_extend(id, hosp_code, profile_id, in_profile, out_profile, total_out, total_in, outpt_last_visit_time, inpt_last_visit_time, source_tj_code, source_tj_remark, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time) values (#{id}, #{hospCode}, #{profileId}, #{inProfile}, #{outProfile}, #{totalOut}, #{totalIn}, #{outptLastVisitTime}, #{inptLastVisitTime}, #{sourceTjCode}, #{sourceTjRemark}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime}) on duplicate key update source_tj_remark=#{sourceTjRemark};
mapper.update:
update center_profile_file_extend
hosp_code = #{hospCode},
profile_id = #{profileId},
in_profile = #{inProfile},
out_profile = #{outProfile},
total_out = #{totalOut},
total_in = #{totalIn},
outpt_last_visit_time = #{outptLastVisitTime},
inpt_last_visit_time = #{inptLastVisitTime},
source_tj_code = #{sourceTjCode},
source_tj_remark = #{sourceTjRemark},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select value as id,value, name as label, ifnull(up_value, "-1") as parentId from center_code_detail where c_code = 'XZQH' and is_valid = '1'
